title: Rehabilitation Strategies and Communication Competency Enhancement Workshop for People Living with HIV

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Developing Competencies to Apply HIV Rehabilitation Strategies and Communication Skills to Real-World Cases for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze rehabilitation-related issues faced by HIV patients and design customized solutions through problem-based learning (PBL)
Learners can practice communication skills to effectively convey rehabilitation requests of HIV patients using a client-centered approach
Learners understand collaboration models with community-based organizations and propose practical workshop design and operation plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
